p: The activity of POD (EC 1.11.1.7) was determined by reading absorbance at 420 nm according to Kar and Mishra (1976) with minor modifications. The reaction mixture consisted of 125 μM tris buffer (pH 7.5), 50 μM pyrogallol, and 50 μM H 2O 2, and 1 ml of the total plant extract was incubated for 5 min at 25°C. As a control, the same reaction medium was incubated in the absence of plant extract under the same conditions.
